post.body: mo sympathy. I'm usually at work for 5AM
I've used rtm for about a year on my computer but the app is dam handy.
cool but it don't help me to decide. A dell xps or a new MacBook. Dam it :-)
I'm tempted to get one after Xmas. I need windows too but I figure that's what bootcamp is for. Never used vista tho any good?
a macbook?
yep n me tho stu has got it at the mo.
got myself a drobo. Those sort of worries are behind me :-)
the samsung Q310
except for the macs. Although they are getting better value with intel chips etc. I'm looking at either mac/samsung/dell
time for a new laptop. The new samsung ones are looking sweet
thanks this is a big help. Just last week I sent an email to Labrats requesting something similar.
Listening to Adam and joe podcasts this morning. LOL funny. Like pre mighty boosh
Just noticed someone I went to school with on QVC talking about Sony headphones.
All Xmas shopping out of the way. Hope to avoid all types of shopping for another year.
Had a good weekend of poker/gaming. Will do better next time. Honest.
Is looking forward to playing poker tonight.
Looking forward to my long weekend off
Not a good day to travel by train. I suggested hitch hiking if desperate. Not many folks with a sense of humour it seems.
Looking forward to jumping on the xbox later.
Is looking forwards to getting a lie in tomorrow. So very tired.
A perk of working a morning shift. I get to have my first cup of coffee earlier. Wohoo caffine goodness. Shame it's instant tho
I'm liking the remember the milk app. Tempted to buy the pro account...
Last day of lates then two days off. Not that I won't be busy. Gotta a lot of stuff to do this month.
Having fun building terrain. Gotta a lot of stuff to do this month.
Back to work this evening. How come a holiday never lasts long enough
Happy bday leo
Just watched top gear in Vietnam. Dam those guys have fun.
I'm sick of being ill.
Merry Xmas world. Who EVA gave me this man flu deserves endless pain. Sniff.
Finally getting to watch new series of topgear. Thankyou iplayer.
Inbetween painting I'm rewatching season one of OZ. second season on it's way to me via lovefilm.com.
Now I'm watching firefly too
Red death the on fire paindeer. Don't ask just watch askaninja.
Enjoyed watching peregrine falcon outside window at work devouring a pigeon. Beautiful if a messy eater
